name: Baio1
script:
def get_material_request_data(cost_center):
    data = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT
    mr.material_request_type AS Baio,
    YEAR(mr.transaction_date) AS transaction_year,
    mri.expense_account,
    SUM(mri.amount) AS total_amount
FROM
    tabMaterial Request AS mr
LEFT JOIN
    tabMaterial Request Item AS mri ON mr.name = mri.parent
WHERE
    mr.material_request_type = 'Budget' AND
    mri.custom_status = 'تم الموافقة'
    AND mr.custom_cost_center = %s
GROUP BY
    mr.material_request_type,
    mri.expense_account
    
    """, (cost_center), as_dict=1)    

    return data

name: attach max 5MB
Customer1
script:
committe = frappe.form_dict.committe
status = frappe.form_dict.status
res = frappe.db.sql(f""" SELECT custom_email FROM `tabCustomer` tc INNER JOIN `tabCommittees you would like to join` tcj ON tc.`name` = tcj.`parent` Where tcj.`committees` = '{committe}' AND  tc.`custom_customer_status` = '{status}' """)
frappe.response["message"] = res
